channel.title: Posts on Blue Dot Iowa
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Blue Dot Iowa

item.title: Calendar
item.description: Send us info to have items added to the calendar.

item.title: Iowa Legislator Info
item.description:
Find your Iowa Legislator

Click here to use the Iowa Legislature’s Find Your Legislator tool. By entering your address you can find your state and federal senators and representatives.

Send mail to your Iowa Legislator

Address letters to: The Honorable Iowa Senate or Iowa House of Representatives Iowa State Capitol 1007 E Grand Ave Des Moines, IA 50319

Interactive District Map

This map allows you to click on a location to see the relevant senators and representatives.

item.title: Take Action
item.description:
Write Thank-You Postcards

The Rt Revd Mariann Edgar Budde
Episcopal Church House
Mount St. Alban
Washington, DC 20016-5094

Ron Vachris
c/o Costco Wholesale
PO Box 34331
Seattle, WA 98124

Buy banned books

Pen.org has a list of the Most Banned Books for 2025.

Add yourself to the WHO email list online

Subscribe to WHO newsletters here

Mindful shopping

Use ProgressiveShopper.com to focus support to blue businesses.

Make Your Voice Heard

Write your US Senators

Senator Charles Grassley
721 Federal Building
210 Walnut Street
Des Moines, IA 50309

item.title: Resources
item.description:
Organizations to Support

Immigrant Legal Resource Center (ilrc.org)

Red Cards are available for download here

United Action for Youth (unitedactionforyouth.org)

Currently looking for volunteers and donations

One Iowa Acton (oneiowaaction.org)

Can sign up for alerts online

One Iowa (oneiowa.org)

Johnson County Dems (jcdems.org)

Represent Us (represent.us)

Fighting Corruption and Gerrymandering

Johnson County Democrats (jcdems.org)
